title._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union uniform with bayoneted musket, knapsack, and knife] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union uniform with bayoneted musket, knapsack, and knife] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.3 x 8.0 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
